original: badzra shrim kh'a la s'a dha nam /
analyzed: badzra shrim kh'a la s'a dha nam /

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs /

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas /
translated: By the sequence of rites explained previously,

original: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um ljang gu'i ye shes nges par rdzogs pa las rdo rje lcags sgrog ma zhal gsum phyag drug ma ste /
analyzed: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um ljang gu'i ye shes nges par rdzogs pa las rdo rje lcags sgrog ma zhal gsum phyag drug ma ste /
translated: from the perfection of the wisdom of the green letter hūṃ on a moon disk at the heart, one should visualize Vajra-chain-woman, with three faces and six arms.

original: mthing nag dang dkar po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //🔽spyan gsum ma rdo rje dang rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags thag dang mda' dang ldan pa ni g-yas pa'i phyag @10b gsum mo //
analyzed: mthing nag dang dkar po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo // spyan gsum ma rdo rje dang rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags thag dang mda' dang ldan pa ni g-yas pa'i phyag @10b gsum mo //
translated: The right and left faces are blue-black and white.🔽She has three eyes, and the three right hands hold a vajra, a chain, and an arrow.

original: sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang / gzhu dang ldan pa ni g-yon pa'i phyag gsum mo //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang / gzhu dang ldan pa ni g-yon pa'i phyag gsum mo //
translated: The three left hands hold a threatening forefinger, a noose, and a bow.

original: zhal cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhal cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan pa /
translated: She has a slightly smiling face.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: ma rungs pa'i sems can gtan nas 'joms par mdzad par bdag nyid bsgoms la phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: ma rungs pa'i sems can gtan nas 'joms par mdzad par bdag nyid bsgoms la phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Having visualized oneself as the one who completely destroys the wicked beings, one should bind the seal.

original: lag pa gnyis so sor rdo rje khu tshur du byas la mthe'u chung gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis kyang lcags thag gi rnam par mdun par bya ba'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis so sor rdo rje khu tshur du byas la mthe'u chung gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis kyang lcags thag gi rnam par mdun par bya ba'o //
translated: Having made the two hands into vajra fists, one should extend the two little fingers and the two index fingers in the form of an iron chain in front.

original: aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra śrikhalā hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for recitation.

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs so /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs so /

original: // / ma la ba'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / ma la ba'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the monk Śīlākara at the behest of Mālava.
